content: Release 3/4 Transforms refers to a github repository for the npm package fhir.versions.r3r4 however the link to the githup repo is dead and the npm package cannot be loaded (unable to resolve the package 'fhir.versions.r3r4'. Are there any npm map packages available? Should I raise a GForge ticket for the dead links?
yes. I need to work on that. one of many things.....

@Grahame Grieve : I submitted a ticket for the fhir-ig-pbulisher and started working on a R3R4 ImplementationGuide, first draft here. Idea is to have the maps included and referenced by the ig and then the standard process/packaging. There are a few issues I'm encountering (thanks for accepting the last pull request) and will bring up the rest of the issues and provide a pull request for the ig-publisher within the next days ...
no but there's meant to be - I want it to live in https://github.com/FHIR/interversion

+1 for interversion, what I intended to do is one step before that ... packaging up all the structuremaps together in an ig/package to be used then by interversion. With that one would have the possiblity to distribute IG's with the maps already inside, eg. for derived SDC ig's where there can be mappings between questionnaire and other resources.
I want to masters to be in interversion

@Grahame Grieve i provided a pull request https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/599 now directly to the maps in the fhir repository, depends also on https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/pull/56. can show it to you also at next wgm, enjou your vacations, the uluru pic is fantastic!

Hi, We want to leverage the work that is already done with the fhirmapping for converting our resources from R3 to R4, we want to use our custom profiles in both R3 and R4 and define mapping and then use the $convert and $transform to achieve that. We are not able to find the package fhir.versions.r3r4 in any registry, can someone help us!
hmm. I'm not sure where this work is at the moment. I think it became part of hl7.fhir.xver.r3 and hl7.fhir.xver.r4
